opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Curiam,
Decree affirmed on the opinion of President Judge Bok, at cost of appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
Edelson, Appellant v. Bernstein.
Argued May 25,1955.
Before Steen, C. J., Steaene, Jones, Bell, Chidset, Musmanno and Aenold, JJ.
David Berger, with him Manuel Fleisher, for appellant.
June 27, 1955:
G. Brewster Rhoads, with him Sidney L. Wickenhaver, and Montgomery, McCracken, Walker & Rhoads, for appellees.
Nathan L. Edelstein, for appellee.
